Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
  Character
      Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Enemy
extends Character
implements java.io.Serializable

The is a enemy class. It allow you to add name, get strength and health for the enemy as well as select weapon which is inherited from inventory class. Enemy can also use move able objects from selections.

Version:
(1.1)
Author:
(Zain Ali)
